title: Automated document intake for court workflows
problem: Court teams needed to process growing volumes of multilingual submissions with limited time for manual checks.
approach: Designed an NLP-driven intake pipeline with automated validation, metadata enrichment, and routing rules.
impact: Shortened review cycles and improved traceability in the governance process without compromising quality.

title: Damages quantification for competition cases
problem: Legal teams required defensible damages estimates across multiple client datasets.
approach: Built econometric models with transparent assumptions, automated data prep, and reusable reporting templates.
impact: Delivered consistent, audit-ready outputs that supported expert reports and decision-making.

title: Automation + dashboards for recurring analytics
problem: Analysts were spending significant time refreshing datasets and rebuilding visuals.
approach: Orchestrated data pipelines in Airflow and surfaced metrics through Shiny/Streamlit dashboards.
impact: Improved turnaround times and made insights accessible to non-technical stakeholders.
